name: Mr. Elly the little elephant plush toy-plush pal-stuffed toy-Christmas gift
description:
One day a little elephant showed up in our balcony!!! He was feeling alone and lost! He asked if we could find him a nice home! Since that day more elephants showed up and we managed to find them some nice homes <3<3<3. Won't you help out?

Mr. Elly is the perfect plush toy for your baby/toddler. He measures approximately 9 ̋ tall and 12 ̋ long. He's made from high quality designer quilting cotton. He's stuffed with polyester fiber filling. 

Mr. Elly is made by using a retromama pattern.
This listing is for a make to order Mr. Elly plush toy/pal/stuffed toy. Fabrics and colors may vary from the pictures. You can always convo and ask me for a specific color choice:D I'm always open to any suggestions!

Please allow 5-7 business days for the completion of your custom order.

This Holiday season SUPPORT handmade <3<3

name: Clutch purse/handbag It's raining polka dots and little birdies-Christmas gift
description:
t's raining polka dots and little birdies!!!

This cute/whimsical clutch is perfect as an everyday purse to carry whatever you many need, wallet, keys, phone, sunglasses!! 

At the top, it measures 7" wide, and it stands approximately 5" inches high. It is fully lined with a deep red striped linen and very sturdy with stiff interfacing used throughout. It closes with a sew on magnetic snap for an easier closure.

Fabrics that are featured in this clutch are for the outside Essex linen in flax , and for the lining a red striped linen. It also has a red striped appliqued cloud with multiple color raindrops out of high quality quilting cotton . All appliqued pieces are machine stitched by using black thread. 

This item was made using a Keyka Lou pattern

name: Little Red Riding Hood Appliqued/embroidered Pillow Cover 16x16'' Off white cotton-Christmas gift
description:
Who doesn't love fairy tales? or Little Red Riding Hood!! And how about a pillow version of this lovely tale, right?

This whimsical handmade cushion cover has multiple color appliqued trees , hills made of quilting cotton on off white 100% medium weight cotton fabric. Almost all appliqued pieces are machine stitched by using black thread. 
The "bad" wolf is cut by hand and is made of dark grey wool felt and has been appliqued on the pillow by using dark grey thread. Little Red Riding Hood has been embroidered onto the pillow, as well as her little basket full of flowers. The back of the pillow features a button opening to allow pillow insert to be removed for easy washing. 
*********************************************************************************************************
This listing is for a make to order cushion cover. Fabrics and colors may vary from the pictures. You can always convo and ask me for a specific color choice:D I'm always open to any suggestions!!!
*********************************************************************************************************
Cushion cover measures approximately 16''x16'' {40cmx40cm} and does not include a pillow form. A 16''x16'' {40cmx40cm} pillow insert can be purchased at just about any fabric or craft store or online.

Care instructions:
Hand Wash only and line dry. If ironing is needed, iron it from the back side.

Please allow 5-7 business days to finish your custom order after Paypal confirmation

Thank you :D

name: Fly away.Appliqued Pillow Cover 16x16'' Off white cotton-Christmas gift
description:
An almost dreamy colorful cushion cover perfect for a baby's nursery, or even your chair, sofa or bed :) !!!

This lovely handmade cushion cover has multiple color appliqued clouds , birds and hot air balloons made of quilting cotton on off white 100% medium weight cotton fabric. All appliqued pieces are machine stitched by using black thread. The handwriting stitching is free motion stitched by using black thread.The back of the pillow features a button opening to allow pillow insert to be removed for easy washing.
